snippet: The presidents of Metro-North and the L.I.R.R. urge extension of the deadline for a new safety system.
abstract: Letter from Howard Permut, president of Metro-North Railroad, and Helena Williams, president of Long Island Rail Road, responds to April 30 editorial about extending Congress's deadline to implement a new national safety systems for railroads.
lead_paragraph: The presidents of Metro-North and the L.I.R.R. urge extension of the deadline for a new safety system.

headline.main: Attention, Riders: A Word From Two Rail Chiefs
headline.print_headline: Attention, Riders: A Word From Two Rail Chiefs
